alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Hinds (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 25 at 10:29AM CDT until May 25 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WARREN...EASTERN CLAIBORNE...SOUTHWESTERN HINDS AND WESTERN COPIAH COUNTIES... At 1028 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Reganton to near Barlow, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Newman and Reganton around 1035 AM CDT. Edwards around 1045 AM CDT. Utica around 1050 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Learned. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
